lead_paragraph: Californians conserved little water in March and local officials were not aggressive in cracking down on waste, state regulators reported Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: California: State Falls Far Short of Goals For Water Savings
headline.main: California: State Falls Far Short of Goals for Water Savings

snippet: Californians conserved little water in March and local officials were not aggressive in cracking down on waste, state regulators reported Tuesday.
